data.name: UnexpandedAcronym_UnexpandedAcronym
data.value: The formal expression for the abbreviation "{0}" was not found in the document.

data.name: FrequentSentenceStart_SentenceStartTooFrequent
data.value: {1}% of sentences start with "{0}".

data.name: WordFrequency_WordUsedTooFrequently
data.value: The word "{0}" is used {1}% of all words. The desired usage rate is around {2}%.

data.name: GappedSection
data.value: The placement of section "{0}" (level {1}) is incorrect. Please relocate it to level {2}.

data.name: JapaneseWordVariation_Normal
data.value: "{0}" is considered a fluctuation expression of "{1}" (position: {2}).

data.name: ParagraphCount
data.value: The number of paragraphs in the section ({0}) exceeded the specified value ({1}).

data.name: ParagraphStartWith
data.value: An invalid paragraph start "{0}" was found.

data.name: DuplicatedSection
data.value: A similar clause (starting from line {1}) was found for the section (starting from line {0}).

data.name: SectionLevel
data.value: The level of clause "{0}" exceeded the specified value ({1}).

data.name: VoidSection
data.value: The section content is empty.

data.name: EmptySection
data.value: An empty section "{0}" was found.

data.name: HeaderLength
data.value: The length of the heading ({0}) exceeded the specified value ({1}).

data.name: ListLevel
data.value: The list level ({0}) exceeded the specified value ({1}).

data.value: The abbreviation "{0}" was found.

data.name: KatakanaSpellCheck
data.value: The katakana word "{0}" is considered a fluctuation expression of "{1}" (position: {2}).

data.name: SentenceLength
data.value: The sentence length ({0} characters) exceeded the specified value ({1} characters).

data.name: SpaceBeginningOfSentence
data.value: There is no space at the beginning of the sentence.

data.name: Spelling
data.value: A possibly misspelled word "{0}" was found.

data.name: StartWithCapitalLetter
data.value: A sentence starting with a lowercase letter "{0}" was found.

data.name: SuggestExpression
data.value: An invalid expression "{0}" was found. Consider using the alternative expression "{1}".

data.name: WordNumber
data.value: The number of words in a sentence ({0}) exceeds the maximum value ({1}).

data.name: Quotation_DoubleRight
data.value: Right quotes are used consecutively.

data.name: Quotation_DoubleLeft
data.value: Left quotes are used consecutively.

data.name: Quotation_RightSpace

data.name: Quotation_LeftSpace
data.value: There is no space next to the left quote.

data.name: Quotation_RightExist
data.value: The right quote is missing.

data.name: Quotation_LeftExist
data.value: The left quote is missing.

data.name: SpaceWithAlphabeticalExpression_Before
data.value: A space is required before the half-width alphabet expression "{0}".

data.name: SpaceWithAlphabeticalExpression_After
data.value: A space is required after the half-width alphabet expression "{0}".

data.name: SpaceWithAlphabeticalExpression_Forbidden
data.value: Invalid spaces were found around the half-width alphabet expression "{0}".

data.name: SymbolWithSpace_Before
data.value: A space is required before the symbol "{0}".

data.name: SymbolWithSpace_After
data.value: A space is required after the symbol "{0}".

data.name: SymbolWithSpace_BeforeAfter
data.value: Spaces are required before and after the symbol "{0}".

data.name: DoubledWord
data.value: The word "{0}" is used more than twice in a sentence.

data.name: SuccessiveWord
data.value: The word "{0}" is used consecutively.

data.name: HankakuKana
data.value: The half-width katakana character "{0}" was found.

data.name: JapaneseStyle
data.value: The use of an incorrect writing style "{0}" was found. Please unify the writing style to plain or polite form.

data.name: DoubleNegative
data.value: A double negative expression "{0}" was found.

data.name: NumberFormat_TooManyDecimals
data.value: The decimal point symbol in the numeric expression "{0}" is used too many times.

data.name: NumberFormat_UndelimitedSequenceTooLong
data.value: The delimiter in the numeric expression "{0}" is invalid. A delimiter is required every three digits.

data.name: NumberFormat_UndelimitedSequenceTooShort
data.value: The position of the delimiter in the numeric expression "{0}" is incorrect.

data.name: InvalidParenthesis_NestingLevelTooDeep
data.value: The nesting level of parentheses ({0}) exceeded the specified value ({1}).

data.value: The length of the sentence inside the parentheses ({0} characters) exceeded the specified value ({1} characters).

data.name: InvalidParenthesis_SubsentenceTooFrequent
data.value: The number of parentheses in a sentence ({0}) exceeded the specified value ({1}).

data.value: "{0}" and "{1}" (position: {2}) are used the same number of times. One of them is considered a fluctuation expression.
